CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK( ERAT_BillableService__c )), ERAT_BillableService__r.Name ,
CASE(Product_Code__c, "1", "Ticket Service", "2", "Ticket Compliments", "3", "Ticket Restaurant", "4", "Wellness Gutschein", "5", "Ticket Junior", "6", "Ticket Shopping", "7", "Ticket Service Card", "8", "Ticket Restaurant Card", "") )
CustomField.label: Product
